content: billings beanie is a beautiful winter hat with subtle texture from the post stitch clusters it comes in a wide variety of sizes so that you can crochet this hat for anyone it begins with a single_crochet in the back loop only ribbed band and then is worked up from there these notes contain affiliate links if you click one and then make a purchase i will earn a small commission at no additional cost to you see my disclosure 1 for details the free ad-supported version of this hat pattern can be found on my website here https //bananamoonstudio com/crochet-beanie-pattern-for-adults/ you also have the option to purchase an inexpensive pdf here on ravelry or in my etsy shop 2 a full video tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/kmgomr2x474 difficulty level easy available sizes preemie baby toddler child adult finished measurements hat circumference 10 12 ¾ 14 17 19 ¾ inches hat height 4 ¾ 6 ½ 7 ¼ 8 9 ½ inches yarn we crochet wonderfluff 3 70% baby alpaca 23% nylon 7% merino wool 142 yds 50 g yarn weight category 5/bulky 1 ball #06 turquoise heather yardage approximately 39 61 77 102 141 yds needed crochet hook k 6 5 mm 4 or size needed to match gauge notions tapestry needle 5 1/2 inch button sewing thread and needle 6 faux fur pom 7 gauge 11 sts x 6 row = about 4 inches in hat main body pattern notes this crochet pattern uses us standard terms for help with abbreviations get my free printable list of crochet abbreviations 8 see this tutorial for help with basic crochet stitches 9 get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https
